statements: UPSERT INTO smart_home_devices (device_id, device_name, device_type, room_name, owner_id, active) VALUES (1, 'Smart Bulb', 'Light', 'Living Room', 101, true) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = EXCLUDED.device_name, device_type = EXCLUDED.device_type, room_name = EXCLUDED.room_name, owner_id = EXCLUDED.owner_id, active = EXCLUDED.active;

UPSERT INTO smart_home_devices (device_id, device_name, device_type, room_name, owner_id, active) VALUES (2, 'Smart Thermostat', 'Temperature Control', 'Bedroom', 102, true) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = EXCLUDED.device_name, device_type = EXCLUDED.device_type, room_name = EXCLUDED.room_name, owner_id = EXCLUDED.owner_id, active = EXCLUDED.active;

UPSERT INTO smart_home_devices (device_id, device_name, device_type, room_name, owner_id, active) VALUES (3, 'Smart Camera', 'Security Camera', 'Entryway', 103, true) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = EXCLUDED.device_name, device_type = EXCLUDED.device_type, room_name = EXCLUDED.room_name, owner_id = EXCLUDED.owner_id, active = EXCLUDED.active;

UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, password) VALUES (1, 'user1', 'user1@example.com', 'pass123') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'user1_updated', email = 'user1_updated@example.com', password = 'updatedpass123'

UPSERT INTO devices (device_id, device_name, device_type, user_id) VALUES (1, 'device1', 'type1', 1) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = 'device1_updated', device_type = 'updated_type1', user_id = 1

UPSERT INTO device_logs (log_id, device_id, log_timestamp, log_message) VALUES (1, 1, NOW(), 'Log entry 1') ON CONFLICT (log_id) DO UPDATE SET log_timestamp = NOW(), log_message = 'Updated log entry 1'
INSERT INTO houses (name, location) VALUES ('House A', 'Location A') ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET location = 'Location A'
INSERT INTO houses (name, location) VALUES ('House B', 'Location B') ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET location = 'Location B'
INSERT INTO houses (name, location) VALUES ('House C', 'Location C') ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET location = 'Location C'
INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, password) VALUES (1, 'JohnDoe', 'password123') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'JohnDoe', password = 'password123';

INSERT INTO devices (device_id, device_name, device_type, user_id) VALUES (1, 'SmartThermostat', 'Thermostat', 1) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = 'SmartThermostat', device_type = 'Thermostat', user_id = 1;
INSERT INTO rooms (room_id, room_name) VALUES (1, 'Living Room') ON CONFLICT (room_id) DO UPDATE SET room_name = 'Living Room';
